email_text:
Subject: Important Notice: Your FedEx Delivery was Missed

Dear Customer,

We regret to inform you that our delivery attempt to your address was unsuccessful today. Our driver attempted to deliver your package but unfortunately, no one was available to receive it.

To reschedule the delivery of your package, please click on the following link to track your shipment and provide us with a new delivery date and time: [fake tracking link]

Please note that failure to reschedule the delivery within the next 24 hours will result in your package being returned to the sender.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and thank you for choosing FedEx for your shipping needs.

Sincerely,
FedEx Customer Service Team
